name: Bathroom
longDesc:
You are in the bathroom.
The exit to the upstairs hallway is behind you.
There is a shower to your left with a shower curtain you can't see through.
There is a sink with a cabinet under it, and a toilet with a stack of magazines on the tank.
There is also a litter box next to the toilet.
description:
You are in the bathroom.
The exit to the upstairs hallway is behind you.

shower.name: shower
shower.description: The shower has a notepad with a word written on it.

cabinet.name: cabinet
cabinet.description: The wooden cabinet under the sink is full of medicine and bathroom supplies.
cabinet.discoveryStatement: A bottle of shampoo is tucked into the corner of the cabinet.

shampoo.name: shampoo
shampoo.description: The shampoo is purple and smells like grapes and flowers.
